features.propertyManagementDesc: Create and manage your real estate portfolio: add properties, photo galleries, rental status, detailed information and performance tracking.
features.tenantManagementDesc: Centralize your rental relationships: tenant files, lease history, payment tracking and direct communication.
features.paymentTrackingDesc: Manage all your collections: rent, charges, security deposits with detailed status and complete transaction history.
features.contractGenerationDesc: Create professional rental contracts with integrated editor, legal validation and electronic signature.
features.analyticsDesc: Visualize your agency statistics: number of properties, ratings, views, performance and recent activity in real-time.
features.leaseManagementDesc: Administer your rental contracts: creation, deadline tracking, renewals and automatic archiving.
features.agencyProfileDesc: Customize your presence: logo, description, service areas, contact information and public visibility management.
features.searchFiltersDesc: Quickly find your properties and tenants with advanced filters: price, type, status, location and custom criteria.
features.responsiveInterfaceDesc: Access your dashboard from any device with an optimized mobile and desktop interface.
features.sectionSubtitle: A modern platform to simplify your real estate agency management
features.ctaTitle: Ready to start your management with IMMOO?
features.ctaSubtitle: Create your agency in minutes and discover all the tools to optimize your activity

immoAgency.heroDescription: Entrust us with the management of your real estate properties. We maximize your income while freeing you from administrative constraints.

propertyManagement.title: Complete Rental Management
propertyManagement.description: We handle all aspects of your rental property management: tenant search, administrative management, maintenance and follow-up.
